Package Tetris

Class Summary
Cell Cells are basically the units used in the Panel and the ShapePanel as units.
Cont Cont is contained in Main (the JFrame) .
EmptyPanel EmptyPanel is contained in Cont and contains the ScorePanel and the ShapePanel objects.
Junk Junk is what a Shape object becomes after hitting the bottom :)
Main This class is provides the JFrame container and the main method for running Tetris.
Mass Mass is the parent class of Junk and Shape.
Panel The Panel class is the main JPanel subclass where the actual animation and the the game is played.
ScorePanel ScorePanel is contained in an EmptyPanel and displays the score
Shape The class that provide objects representing the various shapes.
ShapeMaker The ShapeMaker class makes a Shape object that is chosen randomly out of the 7 possible shapes.
ShapePanel ShapePanel is the class for the object that shows the next coming shape.
